title: Curriculum of Strategy: Artistry of War
tags: curriculum of strategy artistry of war
content:
of 78-138 Force damage. Like Magic Missile, this spell's projectiles cannot miss. The tooltip states this spell offers an INT save to the target, but it doesn't. These properties make this far the most powerful attack spell in the game, though it is limited to a single cast per Short Rest, and it also cannot be upcast using a Level 6 spell slot.

Lvl 5 Spells Banishing Smite ♦ Cloudkill ♦ Cone of Cold ♦ Conjure Elemental ♦ Contagion ♦ Danse Macabre ♦ Destructive Wave ♦ Dethrone ♦ Dispel Evil and
